page.title: Suduli Kumar Balabantaray - Test Lead & IV&V Specialist

hero.name: SUDULI KUMAR BALABANTARAY
hero.description: I seek a professional environment that offers opportunities to showcase my skills and take on challenging roles where I can contribute to the growth of both myself and my organization.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I have 8 years of experience in independent verification (IV) and validation (V) for critical systems in the automotive domain.
about.details: Expertise in automotive testing with extensive experience in RQM tools, programming languages, and advanced automotive software analysis. Proficient in functional testing, performance testing, and validation, with a focus on infotainment systems, ADAS, and critical automotive components.

test_lead.title: Test Lead
responsibilities: Developed and managed comprehensive validation plans using IBM ALM.
Ensured complete requirement traceability via DOORS Next Generation (DNG).
Executed Sanity, Manual, Functional & Performance test cycles.
Spearheaded automation initiatives with dSPACE & ECU-Test Tool.
Validated Infotainment feature set: Steering Wheel Controls, Horn Functionality, Crash detection mechanisms.

senior_engineer.title: Specialist Embedded Test Engineer
senior_engineer.company: HL Klemove India Pvt Ltd (Halla Group)
responsibilities: Designed & executed embedded test plans ensuring coverage & traceability.
Flashed & validated ECUs using Trace32; confirmed firmware integrity.
Established Zero DTC test environments leveraging ADAS Analyser.
Managed defect lifecycle with structured root cause tracking & database hygiene.

test_engineer.title: Senior Embedded Test Engineer
test_engineer.company: Mando Softtech India Pvt Ltd (Halla Group)
responsibilities: Developed & executed unit test suites with VectorCAST achieving target coverage.
Created integration test scenarios validating module interfaces & data flow.
Drove estimation, task allocation & peer reviews; enforced MC/DC practices.
Proactively identified defects early through systematic review & instrumentation.

junior_engineer.title: Test Engineer
responsibilities: Implemented foundational unit tests with VectorCAST for core modules.
Captured, triaged & tracked defects; improved feedback loop speed.
Monitored & raised coverage metrics, highlighting untested paths.

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
skills.subtitle: Explore my technical competencies across various domains. Click on a category to dive deeper into specific skills, proficiency levels, and experience.

items.title: BCM-Systems Validation
items.description: Automotive software validation for Stellantis OEM, focusing on safety-critical Infotainment embedded systems including steering controls, crash detection, and vehicle lighting. Implemented end-to-end testing processes from requirement analysis to automated validation.

items.title: DCU 20 (Domain Control Unit)
items.description: Centralized ADAS domain controller (DCU) designed to process data from various vehicle sensors, including cameras and radars. Centralization approach simplifies the architecture, reduces costs, and enhances scalability and software updates.

items.title: CAnalyzerAI
items.description: AI-powered C code analysis tool that provides intelligent code quality assessment, vulnerability detection, and performance optimization recommendations for automotive embedded systems.

items.title: A+ Grade Performance
items.description: Consistently maintained the highest performance standards.

items.title: Spotlight Award
items.description: HL Mando Softtech India & HL Klemove India
